title: Does Gifting Chromas Exist?
body: I just need confirmation on if it's possible or not, I can't seem to find it in the gifting center or I'm just blind. If not possible, what is the reason for it not being possible?

replies.body:
Lew is correct.  Currently you are not able to gift Chromas at all.  Its always possible that it may come back in the future, but it is just a chance  :(

I wish I had better news!  If you have any other questions, reply back and let me know!
